We use our investment management expertise to help people achieve a lifetime of financial security.5 41. About This Report 
The aim of this report is to provide our clients and other stakeholders with a clear and 
comprehensive overview of Aegon Asset Management’s approach to Responsible Investment.
With the use of case studies and interviews, alongside descriptions of processes, updates
and data, we aim to provide a well-rounded view of our activities in 2016. Also through a numberof ‘next steps’ text boxes we give insight in what is currently on our agenda and what we hopeto achieve in the coming years.2. List of Abbreviations
